name: LetterA
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter a.
des:
From the team that helped a three year old go from phonics to reading at a second grade level comes "Letter A. " 

Letter A. assesses and the concept of phonics and allows early English readers to practice identifying words that start with "A." to improve phonic fluency.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
